title: Watercress, kiwi, mushroom and tomato salad
ingredients: ['125 g (4½ oz) watercress sprigs', '2 kiwi fruit, peeled and thinly sliced', '125 g (4½ oz) button or chestnut mushrooms, thinly sliced', '250 g (9 oz) tomatoes, sliced', 'For the dressing', '1 teaspoon red wine vinegar', 'Salt and black pepper', '4 teaspoons olive oil']
